headline: Packaging Corporation of America (PKG): Is the Recent Pullback an Opportunity? A Fresh Look at Valuation
summary: Packaging Corporation of America (PKG) shares have seen some meaningful moves over the past month, slipping about 6%. Investors are keeping an eye on the company’s performance, particularly after steady gains over the past 3 years. See our latest analysis for Packaging Corporation of America. Packaging Corporation of America’s recent 30-day share price pullback comes after a strong run for long-term holders, with the 3-year total shareholder return still a hefty 73%. Despite a modest bump...
